testcase.classname: User buys a product in demo store application
testcase.name: User buys a product
testcase.system-out: Given user opens the application............................................passed And user navigates to login page............................................passed When user login to the application with "johndrew@gmail.com" and "Password123".passed And user was redirected back to home page...................................passed When user empties cart items................................................passed When user search and find product "Selene Yoga Hoodie"......................passed And user selects color and size.............................................passed And user adds product to cart...............................................passed Then user clicks checkout button............................................passed And user verifies address and order details.................................passed And user clicks place order button..........................................passed Then user checks order receipt "Selene Yoga Hoodie".........................passed And user signs out of the application.......................................passed
